title: 115A.81 DEFINITIONS.
text:
The terms used in sections 115A.80 to 115A.893 have the meanings given them in this section.
"Designation" means a requirement by a waste management district or county that all or any portion of the solid waste that is generated within its boundaries or any service area thereof be delivered to a processing or disposal facility identified by the district or county.
[Repealed, 1995 c 247 art 2 s 55]
